[windows] skip 'UNIX only'

chezmoi apply
stdout evidence

[short] stop

chezmoi dump
cmp stdout golden/dump.json

[!exec:tar] stop

chezmoi archive --gzip --output=archive.tar.gzip
exec tar -tzf archive.tar.gzip
cmp stdout golden/archive

-- golden/archive --
script
-- golden/dump.json --
{
  "script": {
    "type": "script",
    "name": "script",
    "contents": "#!/bin/sh\n\necho evidence\n"
  }
}
-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/run_script --
#!/bin/sh

echo evidence
